channel.title: CSS3 Terms Of Service
channel.description:
I have just started to learn CSS3 so I decided to write up a Terms of Service page. I know someone is going to say "Terms of service pages make no diffrence." Well they do. Some things the page includes:
NO Images. CSS3 Border Radius CSS3 Gradient CSS3 Shadows
It took me about an hour to complete this. Present constructive feedback to me if you want. If you have no HTML or CSS3 knowledge don't bash me. Depending on the feedback and how much people appreciate someone trying to contribute to the RSPS community I will be working on another terms page equip with Javascript and other interactive features. Please enjoy.
Browsers this should work on:
Opera IE 10+ FireFox Google Chrome
FAQ:
[b]ZOMFG YOUR A NOOB L2CODE IT WONT SHOW UP ON IEEEEEE![/b] That's because CSS3 doesn't currently care about your old browser so download A webkit or Mozilla browser.
Downloads: [url=http://uppit.com/tj1xhcuuo59l/Terms.zip]CSS3 Terms Page[/url]
Want a custom one? Ask.

item.title: CSS3 Terms Of Service
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Sibor, post:5, topic:419054”]Sorry to say but this is a pretty shitty job. I can do this in pure HTML if I wanted to, sorry.

Also, I’ve taught myself, HTML, CSS, jQuery, PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, etc…[/quote]

Hey man, thats pretty cool. I was designing for roughly 3 days when I made this. Pretty good for that I assume. Awesome to know your a self taught internet genius. Heres 1 cookie.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

I have just started to learn CSS3 so I decided to write up a Terms of Service page. I know someone is going to say “Terms of service pages make no diffrence.” Well they do. Some things the page includes:

NO Images.
CSS3 Border Radius
CSS3 Gradient
CSS3 Shadows

It took me about an hour to complete this. Present constructive feedback to me if you want. If you have no HTML or CSS3 knowledge don’t bash me. Depending on the feedback and how much people appreciate someone trying to contribute to the RSPS community I will be working on another terms page equip with Javascript and other interactive features.
